translated: Here, in what is seen, heard, or sensed,
he has no notion, not even the slightest.
What view could one have of that brahmin,
who does not accept any view?
He does not accept, he does not prefer,
he does not approve of ideas.
The brahmin is not led by virtue,
he has gone beyond, he does not return.
